Desc.entry: A registered charity that provides care for all patients with active, progressive and advanced disease regardless of diagnosis where cure is not possible. The services include 20 beds, a community palliative care team supporting people in their own home and day support through a therapy and rehabilitation service. St Luke's makes no charge for the services. Referral is by GP or hospital doctor.
